name: Stranded (itch) (Danyal)
description:
Stranded is an space shooter game where you have to avoid the asteroids falling. You and your crew are stranded in space, heading towards an asteroid belt, the only way out is destruction. 💣🤘

Power: DISABLED ❌

Steering: DISABLED ❌

Communications: DISABLED ❌

Weapons: ENABLED ✅

This is my first game I made using Gamemaker. Since it is my first game there are a couple of issues and it is not complete but it's still a cool game I decided to share. 😎

🌠 Shoot the obstacles with your lasers 

🦾 Survive all the asteroids

⚡ Make your way to the end

🎶 Included Audio

👩‍🚀 🚀🌠🥌🧨🧨🧨

How to play:

• Use the arrow keys to move left and right! ➡🔲⬅

• Use the spacebar to shoot! 🔫
